entries.text: ProgressOS now has a project sidebar showing live progress bars for all active projects. Each bar updates based on the selected day in the timeline. #Public
Working on the Twitter follower graph visualization - exploring ways to show network growth through mutual connections. API access is tricky but making progress with mock data. #Public

Kicked off the Social Graph project - want to visualize my Twitter network and see which communities I grew into over time. The idea is to trace back through mutual follows to find 'entry points' into each community. #Public

Twitter API v2 has strict rate limits and requires Project enrollment for follower data. Free tier gives you user lookups but not full network access. Exploring browser-based scraping as a fallback. #Public
Timeless Wiki is now in polish mode - the MVP is done and I'm refining the demo experience. This one's about creating evergreen content that stays relevant regardless of when you read it. #Public
Web3 Jobs is production-ready! Built a job board that aggregates Web3 opportunities. The scrapers are humming and the frontend is clean. Now it's about polish and getting users. #Public
Talent Passport hit MVP - the CV parser is working and we can generate structured talent profiles from uploaded resumes. Next step is matching candidates to opportunities. #Public
Training an agent on agency is never fun but here we are. #Public
Setup INPROGRESS OS - automated daily accountability system #Public
I'm shippinningggg - created a website to send daily updates with photos of what I'm building through TG. Fingers crossed I keep this up #Public

Ashby MCP - everyone wants to use tools through Slack so I made an MCP and then ran it through an LLM (claude) with Backend on Railway so you can ping the bot in channel. Ashby APIs suck so I have to keep testing and fixing. I wish I could do the ralph loop well or at least had the $ to find out. #Public
